posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: Chief Bender - got one, thanks!
posts.post_content:
**GOT ONE, THANKS!

Looking to pick up one CHEAP Chief Bender to put in my HOF Collection.  I'd really like to pay less than $50 if possible for his card.  What do you have?  :)

Jimi
